events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving the wrong item.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received?
Here is my order number 123456, and I have attached a photo showing the item that arrived instead.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and will await confirmation.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please allow a few days for it to reflect in your account.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for resolving this issue quickly.
Closing this case now as the refund was successfully processed and confirmed by the customer.
